full_text: The disinfecting and hand-washing that became common during the Covid-19 pandemic have also shut out other infections such as chickenpox and stomach flu https://t.co/mkKZ3avEbM

localize.full_text: コヴィド19のパンデミックの際に普及した消毒と手洗いは、水痘や胃腸炎などの他の感染症もシャットアウトした https://t.co/mkKZ3avEbM
在Covid-19大流行期间变得普遍的消毒和洗手工作也将其他传染病拒之门外，如水痘和胃流感https://t.co/mkKZ3avEbM。
